ai-patthana21.26:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.26:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.26:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.26:3.1_0: or interruption, or without a trainee’s teaching, there’s no cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.26:3.1_1: or cause; for the sake of a trainee,
ai-patthana21.26:3.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.26:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
